title: Remove Draven from URF.
body: His Q is completely game breaking in URF. I dunno why he's allowed to stay but you removed 4 other champions apparently. Completely demoralizing game and all he had to do was do what any ADC does, except spam one button regardless of catching his axes while chunking people for half health.

replies.body: At least you can run from Draven. Maokais targetted root follows you even if you flash, and he can just keep perma-rooting you.
